body: Similar to a leather arm armor piece, a leather lamellar arm armor piece is constructed of a number of discrete hard-boiled leather plates laced together in parallel rows.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Variant Rules/Piecemeal Armor/Armor Piece Descriptions/Arms/Leather Lamellar Arm Armor Piece
name: Leather Lamellar Arm Armor Piece
